00037 bool GRenderer::initialize(unsigned int w, unsigned int h, const char* renderAPI)
00038 {
00039     uninitialize();
00040 
00041 
00042     //Create a new render log
00043     m_gameRenderLog = new LogWriter(LogWriter::getPathToLogFile("Render.Log"));
00044 
00045 
00046     printf("GRender: Getting API instance\n");
00047 
00048     //Get a API instance
00049     m_renderAPI = GraphicsAPI::getAPIInstance(renderAPI);
00050 
00051     printf("GRender: Attempted to get API instance\n");
00052 
00053     //Test the render API was got succesfully
00054     if (m_renderAPI == 0)
00055     {
00056 
00057         //If there was no gainable API instance bottle out
00058 
00059         char Buffer[512];
00060         sprintf(Buffer, "GRender: Unable to get a render context for graphics API %s API invalid or not supported by the system\n", renderAPI);
00061 
00062         m_gameRenderLog->writeData(Buffer);
00063 
00064         uninitialize();
00065         return false;
00066     }
00067     else
00068     {
00069 
00070         char Buffer[512];
00071         sprintf(Buffer, "GRender: Render API summary: %s\n", m_renderAPI->getAPISummary());
00072 
00073         //If you got a API instance write a summary to the log
00074         m_gameRenderLog->writeData(Buffer);
00075 
00076     }
00077 
00078     RenderWindow* gameWindow = m_renderAPI->getRenderWindow();
00079 
00080     if (gameWindow->create("Engine", w, h, this) == false)
00081     {
00082         m_gameRenderLog->writeData("GRender: Unable to create window");
00083         uninitialize();
00084         return false;
00085     }
00086 
00087     if (m_renderAPI->initialize() == false)
00088     {
00089         m_gameRenderLog->writeData("GRender: Render API failed to initialize");
00090         uninitialize();
00091 
00092         return false;
00093     }
00094 
00095     //Create a texture monitor
00096     m_textureMonitor = new TextureMonitor();
00097 
00098     //Set default wireframe values
00099     m_shouldRenderWireframe = false;
00100 
00101 
00102     //Set the layers
00103     setLayer(Layer_Interface, new InterfaceLayer());
00104     setLayer(Layer_3D, new ThreeDRenderLayer());
00105 
00106     printf("GRender: Done initializing the renderer\n");
00107 
00108 
00109     return true;
00110 }

00112 void GRenderer::uninitialize()
00113 {
00114 
00115     //Free all the layers
00116     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < Layers_Max; ++i)
00117     {
00118 
00119         if (m_renderLayers[i] != 0)
00120             delete m_renderLayers[i];
00121 
00122         m_renderLayers[i] = 0;
00123     }
00124 
00125     //Free the texture monitor (And any textures it has loaded);
00126     if (m_textureMonitor != 0)
00127     {
00128         delete m_textureMonitor;
00129         m_textureMonitor = 0;
00130     }
00131 
00132     //Next delete the render API (And hopefully all the windows/GL context resources it was using, hehe)
00133     if (m_renderAPI != 0)
00134     {
00135         delete m_renderAPI;
00136         m_renderAPI = 0;
00137     }
00138 
00139 
00140 
00141     //Delete the log last just in case something wants to write data while it dies
00142     if (m_gameRenderLog != 0)
00143     {
00144         delete m_gameRenderLog;
00145         m_gameRenderLog = 0;
00146     }
00147 
00148 
00149     return;
00150 }

00175 void GRenderer::renderScene(int wx, int wy)
00176 {
00177 
00178     begin(wx, wy);
00179 
00180     getLayer(Layer_3D)->draw(this, wx, wy);
00181 
00182 
00183     m_renderAPI->setupFor2D(wx, wy);
00184 
00185     m_renderAPI->enableBlending();
00186 
00187     m_renderAPI->disableBlending();
00188     m_renderAPI->clearActiveTexture();
00189 
00190     getLayer(Layer_Interface)->draw(this, wx, wy);
00191 
00192 
00193 
00194 
00195 
00196

00216 void GRenderer::update(float seconds)
00217 {
00218     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < Layers_Max; i++)
00219     {
00220 
00221         if (GRenderer::m_renderLayers[i])
00222         {
00223
